name: v49.2.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-banner: add dismissed-banner-id prop by @SnowboardTechie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1488
* va-file-input: add support restricting the size of the file added by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1490
### Fixes
* va-button-pair: add support for submitting form by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1482
* va-language-toggle: accessibility updates by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1484
* va-button & va-button-pair: allow custom text for continue variation by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1485
### Other Changes
* CSS-Library: Improved font handling for source sans pro across multiple platforms by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1483

## New Contributors
* @SnowboardTechie made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1488

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v49.1.1...v49.2.0

name: v49.1.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-table: Adding optional "full-width" prop for shorter-form content by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1473
### Fixes
* va-telephone | Remove aria-hidden from notClickable phone by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1471
* va-textarea: Move Headline location to be W3C compliant by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1470
* va-file-input: Fix for required label when inside a header by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1474
* va-radio-option: Fixes to global style bleeds by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1477


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v49.0.0...v49.1.0

name: v49.0.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### Breaking Changes
* va-file-input-multiple: update data for vaMultipleChange to return more detail (BREAKING) va-file-input: fix bug with upload message not resetting by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1460
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-file-input-multiple: allow for slots to be conditionally rendered on file inputs by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1458
* va-file-input: display previously uploaded file by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1461
* va-file-input: add statusText prop by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1463
### Fixes
* va-telephone: add health resource center number to constants by @Dr-Pongo in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1455
* va-select: Adding 'vaSelectBlur' event by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1466
* va-checkbox and va-radio-option: Improved a11y  by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1442
* va-alert: Fixing it so close button on slim alerts doesn't overflow by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1467
### Other Changes
* CSS-Library: Moving fonts loading to core by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1469
* CSS-Library: add primitive and semantic spacing tokens by @micahchiang in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1468

## New Contributors
* @Dr-Pongo made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1455

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v48.4.0...v49.0.0

name: v48.4.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-button: add loading variation by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1446
* va-search-input: add clear search button by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1450
### Fixes
* va-accordion: add custom event to expand/collapse all button by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1445
* va-date: remove unnecessary aria labels for select by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1447
* va-alert-sign-in: Hides no-sign-in-link when not present by @asg5704 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1452
* va-link: add aria-label to all variations by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1448
### Other Changes
* css-library: add `img` folder to dist by @micahchiang in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1441
* css-library: fix the html element's font-size so it will respect browser settings by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1444

## New Contributors
* @asg5704 made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1452

name: v48.2.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-process-list: add ability to customize eyebrow status text by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1422
* va-combo-box: add new component by @oleksii-morgun in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1373
* va-process-list-item: add HeaderLevel element with part=header for custom styling by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1427
* va-checkbox: add indeterminate prop by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1426
* va-alert-sign-in: add new component by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1424
* va-table: add scrollable prop by @janechodance in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1428
### Fixes
* va-accordion: remove aria-controls and aria-expanded from expand all button by @1Copenut in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1400
* va-table: Parse html to plain string before setting it to CSS content by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1431
* va-language-toggle: Add label text to event, remove va-link analytics by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1434
### Other Changes
* CSS library: add address block  by @rsmithadhoc in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1432

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v48.1.1...v48.2.0

name: v48.1.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-language-toggle: add component by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1386
* build: allow vite to lazy load stencil components by @gsong in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1415
### Fixes
* va-accordion: fix Stencil test re-render warning by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1403
* va-text-input: resolve Stencil test warnings by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1405
* va-additional-info & va-alert-expandable: remove slot content from Stencil axe test by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1406
* va-link & va-link-action: update analytics tests and lifecycle by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1407
* va-table: update loading lifecycle and fix Stencil axe error by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1410
* va-banner: fix analytics Stencil test warnings by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1408
* va-language-toggle: resolve Stencil test warning and errors by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1413
* va-table: add horizontal overflow scrolling and update screen reader button text by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1416

## New Contributors
* @gsong made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1415

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v48.0.2...v48.1.0

## What's Changed
### Fixes
* va-on-this-page: updating line-length for list items to use new token by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1394

* Update to USWDS v3.9.0 by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1397

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-file-input: add support for read-only mode by @pennja in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1300
* va-date: add prop to make month optional by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1377
### Fixes
* va-select: add import for focusable mixin by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1376
* va-modal: set overflow-wrap:anywhere on modal content by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1372
* focusable: add tabindex selector by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1380
### Other Changes
* CSS Library: style and image path updates for alert and action link modules by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1378
* CSS Library: remove the /alerts image path by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1381

name: v47.2.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-process-list-item: Add text to describe status by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1362
* Add custom message to va-file-input and update message in va-file-input-multiple by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1367
* va-table: add sorting variation by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1358
### Fixes
* va-modal: set box-sizing to border-box to prevent text overflow by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1357
* va-accordion: open accordion when media is print by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1363
* va-process-list: update status eyebrow text to uppercase by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1365
* va-process-list: change color variable from usa to vads by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1368
* va-table: show table header for non-stacked & stacked small screen by @harshil1793 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1364
* va-table: update va-table-inner to properly scope table header row to columns by @1Copenut in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1370
### Other Changes
* CSS Library: replace FA icons for action link and alert classes by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1371

## New Contributors
* @bellepx0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1361

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v47.1.0...v47.2.0

body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-link-action: Adding an aria label prop by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1321
* va-checkbox-group: add message-aria-describedby prop by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1327
### Fixes
* va-search-input: don't fire extra submit event on keyboard form submit by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1320
* va-link: fix double outline on focus by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1323
* va-checkbox & va-radio-option: Remove option-label by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1329
* va-file-input: Focus on delete after closing modal by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1326
* va-checkbox: Fix description slot by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1331
* **multiple components**: focus outline color fixes by @harshil1793 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1305
### Other Changes
* CSS Library: Add mobile forms surface tokens by @danbrady in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1317
* CSS Library: add hub-records color utility classes by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1322
* CSS Library: Remove progress-box padding by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1324
* CSS Library: update breakpoint names and adjust `small-desktop-screen` value by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1325


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v46.2.3...v46.3.0

## What's Changed

### Other Changes
* css-library: add !important to utilities by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1310


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v46.0.3...v46.1.3

name: v46.0.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### Breaking Changes
* va-number-input: Component removal by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1284
* va-table: remove v1 code by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1271
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-text-input: add step prop for decimal support by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1281
* va-link: add external link variation by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1269
* va-link: add "Back" variant by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1288
* va-button-pair: add support for custom button text by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1294
* web-components: upgrade to stencil@v3 by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1291
* web-components: adjust i18n config by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1297
### Fixes
* va-icon: Adding arrow_circle_right sprite by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1285
* va-file-input-multiple: Filter out empty file from emitted files by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1292
* va-radio: re-add mixins by @micahchiang in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1296
* va-date and va-memorable-date: fix error state display by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1279
### Other Changes
* CSS Library: Fix medium-screen utility generator so that it handles multiple properties by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1287
* CSS Library: Change "bg" to "background" in semantic token by @jessicawoodin in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1157

## New Contributors
* @jessicawoodin made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1157

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v45.0.0...v46.0.0

name: v45.0.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### Breaking Changes
* va-select: Remove v1 variation by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1258
* va-radio, va-radio-option: Remove v1 variation by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1260
* va-breadcrumbs: Remove v1 variation by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1265
* va-checkbox, va-checkbox-group, va-privacy-agreement: Remove v1 variation by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1264
* va-segmented-progress-bar: Remove v1 variation by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1270
* va-additional-info: Remove v1 variation by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1272
* va-pagination: Remove v1 variation by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1273
* va-summary-box: Remove v1 variation by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1274
* va-button & va-button-pair: Remove V1 variation by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1275
* va-process-list: Remove v1 variation by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1276
* va-file-input/va-file-input-multiple: Remove v1 variation by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1277
* va-search-input: Remove v1 variation by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1278
* va-alert and va-banner: Remove v1 variation by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1268
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-search-input: Add disable-analytics prop by @randimays in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1257
* va-text-input: Add suffix icon support by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1280
### Fixes
* va-statement-of-truth: Reflect error prop in va-text-input for styling by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1255
* va-date: V1 code cleanup by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1262
* va-file-input: Improve action button accessibility by @harshil1793 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1261
* va-modal: Fix focus state bug when va-radio-option is in modal contents by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1266
* va-back-to-top: Set display none to link when it should not be visible by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1267
### Other Changes
* CSS Library: Generate medium-screen breakpoint utility classes by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1263

## New Contributors
* @randimays made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1257

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v44.0.0...v45.0.0

body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### Fixes
* va-textarea: Add support for formHeadingLevel prop by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1232
* va-file-input: Update screen reader message when file is uploaded or removed by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1228
* va-accordion: Replace FA icons with va-icon in storybook by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1235
* va-breadcrumbs: Updating language support for breadcrumbs by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1227
* va-button: Use white background on secondary hover by @Mottie in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1241
* va-button: Add submit functionality by @rmessina1010 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1174
* Update USWDS package to v3.8.1 by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1237


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v43.0.1...v43.0.2

name: v43.0.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at main -->

## What's Changed
### Breaking Changes
* va-breadcrumb: Add lang attr support by @Andrew565 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1206
### New Features & Components ðŸŽ‰
* va-memorable-date: add props to support custom error messages for day, month, or year by @it-harrison in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1208
* va-table: add stacked table variant by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1204
* va-text-input: New prefix and suffix variant by @harshil1793 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1217
### Fixes
* va-breadcrumbs: Add export to Breadcrumb type so components.d.ts can find it by @ataker in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1210
* va-search-input: fix suggestion box from always staying open by @nickjg231 in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1216
* va-file-input: Update modal title by @danbrady in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1218
* va-telephone: remove number formatting from aria-label by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1220
* va-link: add style inheritance to anchor element by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1222
* Add override to header margin on adjacent selector by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1213

### Other Changes
* CSS Library: add linked header style by @jamigibbs in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1198
* CSS Library: Update to _core-variables.scss to change $image-path to /img by @powellkerry in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1205
* CSS Library: add anchor tag to va-textintro by @micahchiang in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1215

## New Contributors
* @danbrady made their first contribution in https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/pull/1218

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/component-library/compare/v42.2.2...v43.0.0
